DOC.HEADLINE: MISSING MENTION
DOC.TEXT: Your " expert ' s " advice in " Travel Insider " ( " Dollars Buy More Again in Europe , " April 17 ) , surprised me since he did not mention the benefits of using a credit_card when traveling . In 95 % of the instances that I have used a credit_card in Europe , I have " made money " when the bills finally come_in to be paid . RICHARD J . WARREN Van Nuys
